attributes.action: parents allowed two weeks floating holidays for children
attributes.additional_details: parents should be allowed at least 10 days so they can pick a holiday when they need to or can get time off work this would stop holiday companies finding the need to charge so much. the dates should be agreed with the school of course.whats the point in giving them 6 weeks off when parents are being ripped off or cant afford what it costs.give the parents a choice on when they would like 2 weeks holiday
